articles.author: Dan Mangan
articles.title: Philadelphia DA sues Elon Musk PAC to stop $1 million lottery for voters - CNBC
articles.description: Elon Musk and his America PAC, who are backing Donald Trump, have offered registered voters in swing states the chance to win $1 million each day.
articles.content: The Philadelphia District Attorney's Office filed a lawsuit seeking to stop Elon Musk and his political action committee from awarding $1 million to registered voters in swing states, accusing them o… [+2521 chars]
